se.cbb.jprime.topology

Class NamesMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.topology.StringMap
      • se.cbb.jprime.topology.NamesMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sampleable, Dependent, StateParameter, GraphMap

    public class NamesMap
extends StringMap
    Extension of a StringMap, where vertex/arc indices may be retrieved from names (and vice versa).

    However, note that retrieving an index will only work for unique name identifiers; for instance, a bootstrap value vertex name (say, "99") will in general have many peers with the same name (in which case one of them will be returned).

    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.
